name: Story (Demo)
description:
This is a Demo for a game I am working on. It goes through the first cave and first boss. 

The game follows Arthur, a young King Arthur,  on the day he retrieves Excalibur. That night Camalot gets attacked by a group called the Editors, who are attacking because the story has been changed and has to be restarted. Arthur then sets out to find what went wrong and to find someone special to him.
